title: Tikrotse
author: Tikrotse
content: FLY KORGI P2E GAMEREFERRAL CAMPAIGNüî• DECENTRALIZED BNB REFFERAL CAMPAIGNüíµ Invite your friends to play and instantly get 20% in BNB from their deposit directly to your wallet address‚ö°Ô∏è To participate in the referral campaign, go to the game website https://flykorgi.korginft.space, click on "Referrals" and copy your referral linkBOUNTY CAMPAIGNBOUNTY REWARD POOL = 10,000 BUSDTELEGRAM CAMPAIGN - 5,000 BUSDTWITTER CAMPAGN - 5,000 BUSDGENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONSIf you want to take part in this bounty you have to join in the following telegram groups:Telegram Community - https://t.me/korginftchatBefore filling out the form you have to make a proof of authentication post in this threadPROOF OF AUTHENTICATIONCode:Bitcointalk Profile Link:Telegram Username:Bounty Campaign`s:TWITTER CAMPAIGNRULES‚óè ¬†Must have at least 50 followers‚óè ¬†Follow and like the official Twitter account: https://twitter.com/korginft‚óè ¬†Make 1 tweet and 1 re-tweet every day. Use information from official social networks. Your tweet should have hashtags: #BSC #DeFi #Crypto #Airdrop #p2eREWARDS‚óè 50 - 500 Followers: 1 stake, per one tweet or re-tweet‚óè 501 - 1000 Followers: 2 stakes, per one tweet or re-tweet‚óè 1001 - 3000 Followers: 3 stakes, per one tweet or re-tweet‚óè 3001 - 5000 Followers: 4 stakes per one tweet or re-tweet‚óè 5001+ Followers: 5 stakes per one tweet or re-tweetTELEGRAM CAMPAIGNRULES‚óè Join To - https://t.me/korginftchatREWARDS‚óè 1 stake‚óè 10 stakes for setting name
